# -*- CMakeLists.txt generated by CodeLite IDE. Do not edit by hand -*-

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8)

project(SunRiZe)

# Define some variables
set(PROJECT_PATH "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}")


#{{{{ User Code 1
# Place your code here
set(wxWidgets_CONFIGURATION mswu)
find_package(wxWidgets COMPONENTS core base REQUIRED)
include(${wxWidgets_USE_FILE})
find_package(PythonInterp) 
find_package(PythonLibs) 
#}}}}

include_directories( . )


add_definitions(-I ${PYTHON_INCLUDE_DIRS})
add_definitions(-O3)
add_definitions(-std=c++11)
add_definitions(-Wall)
add_definitions(
    -DNDEBUG
    -D_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64
    -DWXUSINGDLL
    -D__WXGTK__
)


# Linker options
set(LINK_OPTIONS ${LINK_OPTIONS} ${PYTHON_LIBRARY})
set(LINK_OPTIONS ${LINK_OPTIONS} -s)
set(LINK_OPTIONS ${LINK_OPTIONS} -L../bin)
set(LINK_OPTIONS ${LINK_OPTIONS} -lSunRiZeModel)
set(LINK_OPTIONS ${LINK_OPTIONS} -Wl,-rpath,'$ORIGIN')
set(LINK_OPTIONS ${LINK_OPTIONS} -Wl,-z,origin)
set(CMAKE_LDFLAGS "${CMAKE_LDFLAGS} -L. ")

# Define the CXX sources
set ( CXX_SRCS
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/JSONParser.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/Text.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/Glob.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/GContext.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/GObject.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/GStandalone.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/GJunction.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/GPrimary.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/GenCode.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/GPanel.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/GSelector.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/GDrawHelper.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/GToolBar.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/MainPanel.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/main.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/MBox.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/FieldsHelper.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/GFrame.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/AboutBox.cpp
)

set_source_files_properties(
    ${CXX_SRCS} PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS 
    " -O3 -std=c++11 -Wall -pthread")

if(WIN32)
    enable_language(RC)
    set(CMAKE_RC_COMPILE_OBJECT
        "<CMAKE_RC_COMPILER> ${RC_OPTIONS} -O coff -i <SOURCE> -o <OBJECT>")
endif(WIN32)



#{{{{ User Code 2
# Place your code here
#}}}}

add_executable(SunRiZe ${RC_SRCS} ${CXX_SRCS} ${C_SRCS})
target_link_libraries(SunRiZe ${LINK_OPTIONS})
target_link_libraries(SunRiZe m )
target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME} ${wxWidgets_LIBRARIES})

#{{{{ User Code 3
# Place your code here
#}}}}
